meanings.definition: The state of wanting to own or control something or someone.
meanings.sent1: Her possessiveness over her favorite toy was evident when she refused to share it with anyone.
meanings.sent2: His possessiveness towards his girlfriend often made her feel suffocated.
meanings.sent3: The possessiveness of the toddler over his teddy bear was both adorable and slightly concerning.
meanings.sent4: The possessiveness of the dictator over the country was like a dark cloud looming over the citizens.
meanings.sent5: The possessiveness of the dragon over its treasure was legendary among the villagers.

meanings.sent1: The possessiveness of the child towards his belongings was a result of his upbringing.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his possessiveness and constant need to control every aspect of her life.
meanings.sent3: The possessiveness of the cat over its favorite spot on the couch was a daily source of amusement for the family.
meanings.sent4: The possessiveness of the artist over his work was akin to a mother bear protecting her cubs.
meanings.sent5: The possessiveness of the old man over his antique collection was palpable in the way he meticulously cared for each piece.
